definition: A vital organ located within the human body, responsible for processing and storing information, controlling bodily functions, and facilitating cognitive abilities. It is commonly referenced in the context of neuroscience, psychology, and medical discussions.

examples.german: Das Gehirn ist das zentrale Organ des Nervensystems.
examples.english: The brain is the central organ of the nervous system.

examples.german: Das Gehirn besteht aus Milliarden von Nervenzellen.
examples.english: The brain consists of billions of neurons.
The brain controls all bodily functions.

examples.german: Das Gehirn ist für das Denken und Fühlen verantwortlich.
examples.english: The brain is responsible for thinking and feeling.

examples.german: Eine Verletzung des Gehirns kann schwerwiegende Folgen haben.
examples.english: An injury to the brain can have serious consequences.
